timeline.message:
Upgrade auto-installed Node to latest LTS and suppress some `npm install` errors (#8956)

Upgrade installed node to latest LTS and set `scripts-prepend-node-artifact` to ensure same node is used to run npm and package install scripts

Related to #8741

Do not force installation of compatible pnpm version when system property `vaadin.ignoreVersionChecks` is set (#8971)

Skip all version checks when ignoreVersionChecks flag is set

Use found pnpm even if version outside of range when `ignoreVersionChecks=true`.

fix: surround 404 check with spaces (#8997)

`checkLogsForErrors` checks if the message contains `404`,
but it will match if the sequence is part of a number.
# Conflicts:
#	flow-test-util/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/testutil/TestBenchHelpers.java

timeline.bodyText: Remove this use of "SUPPORTED_NODE_MAJOR_VERSION"; it is deprecated.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot
